alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Lyon; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 4:53PM EDT until July 24 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN CALDWELL...NORTHEASTERN TRIGG AND CENTRAL LYON COUNTIES... At 352 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eddyville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Princeton, Cadiz, Eddyville, Land Between The Lakes Area, Cobb and Kuttawa. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 36 and 62. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 68 and 82. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
